title: Understanding Precedents
text: Precedents in a spreadsheet are the cells that provide data to a formula in another cell. Tracing precedents helps you understand which cells are contributing to the value of a particular cell.

title: Where to Find the Option
text: The 'Trace Precedents' option is usually found under the 'Formulas' tab in most spreadsheet applications.

title: Steps to Trace Precedents
text: To trace precedents, you need to navigate to the 'Formulas' tab and select 'Formula Auditing'. From there, click on 'Trace Precedents'.
choices: click on the cell to see the cells they are based on
click on the cell to see precedents arrows
